article: Many people of my generation(,) say that there is no hope for the future because of the way that  _  people behave today. Their first argument is that when we were young we used to look after the  _  people in our community and help them. They also say that young people today don't  _  about anything or anyone. However, I think the reason why we looked after older people was that we had no  _  . People had to live with their  _  and grandparents because they had no money. Young people today earn more and have more  _  to live where they want. Their second argument is that in our day we didn't expect (,)to be given jobs -----and that young people now don't look for jobs, but just complain about  _  . On the other hand, things were easier in the past and it was always easy to get a job if you had friends and contacts . It is really  _  today. In conclusion I think there is hope for the  _  . This generation, like generations before them, has new  _  as well as old problems. If they learn from our mistakes the world will be a better place in future.
